content: {"name": "CUMAC", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The client has to come any day Monday - Friday, between the hours of 9:30 am - 2:30 pm with their identification and proof of address to be able to schedule an appointment. Only serves Passaic county.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cumac.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "223 Ellison Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Paterson", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07505", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9173061, "longitude": -74.1678053}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 742-5518", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
